p: Throughout the 2 months of obesity-induction period, both groups showed continued body weight increase. From weeks 2 to 9, the HFD group gained around 16% ( p < 0.001) more weight than the NFD group ( Figure 2A). The high-fat diet intake resulted in an extra 153.3 g of body weight gain in relation to the chow-fed rats ( p < 0.001) ( Figure 2B).
